original: Cerne, Per Gunnar, apotekare, Kar*lislkroinia, f. 9/8/91 i Södina Afsum., Malmöh. 1. G. 25 m. Elsa Arndt. Barn: Per-Gunnar f. 27, Nils-Eric 38. — Stud:ex. i Lund 13, farm. kand. 17, apot:ex. 22. Eilev v. apot. Hjorten i Lund 13-16, anst. v. apot. i Emmaboda, Eksjö, Lund, Ystad, Oskarshamn, Ljiunigiby 22-26, varav ’som fö’re’s!t. siex mån., åter v. Hjorten i Lund 26-41, varav s. förest, c :a tre år, priv. å apoteket Tre Kronor i Karlliskrona 41.
translated: Cerne, Per Gunnar, pharmacist, born August 9, 1891 in Södina Afsum, Malmöhus County. 1st marriage in 1925 to Elsa Arndt. Children: Per-Gunnar (born 1927) and Nils-Eric (born 1938). He passed his high school exams in Lund in 1913, graduated with a degree in pharmacy in 1917, and became a licensed pharmacist in 1922. He worked at the Hjorten pharmacy in Lund between 1913-1916, and was employed at pharmacies in Emmaboda, Eksjö, Lund, Ystad, Oskarshamn, and Ljungby between 1922-1926, including six months as the head pharmacist. He returned to Hjorten in Lund from 1926-1941, serving as head pharmacist for three years. He then worked privately at the Tre Kronor pharmacy in Karlskrona from 1941.
